markdown:
**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 204
  • Change the [human](/Traits.aspx?ID=90) trait to [gnome](/Traits.aspx?ID=80).
  • Add [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5) and [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) to the NPC's languages.
  • Add [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).
name: Gnome
